mapper.insert: INSERT INTO letters (sell_user_no, buy_user_no, item_no, review_deg, review_content) VALUES (#{sell_user_no}, #{buy_user_no}, #{item_no}, #{review_deg}, #{review_content})
mapper.select: SELECT letter_no, receive_user_no, send_user_no, item_no, letter_title, letter_content, letter_check FROM letters WHERE receive_user_no=#{receive_user_no} ORDER BY letter_no DESC
